comments.raw_text:
Per Tara, we received an email about a user who was unable to create a Creative Collective account and login.  Seems it is failing on the CSRF token for this particular user, but other users do not seem to be affected.


> Hi I am trying to sign up for the firefox t-shirt contest, but every  
> time I do I get an error saying,
> Verification Failed
>
>
> The token you provided either could not be found or expired.
comments.text:

comments.raw_text:
Another user emailed us about a similar problem:

"I have tried several times to register (join us) on your website so that I can enter the design competition for the firefox 4 tshirt. It just keeps telling me that the verification has failed, even though I feel I am completing the form correctly."
